spec.long_desc: A weathered stone fountain bubbles cheerfully in the center of the square.
spec.detailed_desc: This ancient fountain has stood at the heart of Millbrook for generations. Carved from gray granite, it depicts a mermaid holding a conch shell from which water cascades into a circular basin below. The stone is worn smooth by time and countless hands trailing through the cool water. Copper coins glint beneath the surface, wishes made by hopeful townsfolk.
